thread.section_title: Archive News & Video for Monday, 26 Feb 2018 | Reuters.com
thread.title: BRIEF-ASEAN Capital Markets Forum Says Retail Investors In Malaysia, Singapore And Thailand To Have Wider Access To Fund Managers Across 3 Countries‍​

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-ASEAN Capital Markets Forum Says Retail Investors In Malaysia, Singapore And Thailand To Have Wider Access To Fund Managers Across 3 Countries‍​
text:
Feb 26 (Reuters) - ASEAN CAPITAL MARKETS FORUM:
* RETAIL INVESTORS IN MALAYSIA, SINGAPORE AND THAILAND TO HAVE WIDER ACCESS TO FUND MANAGERS ACROSS THE 3 COUNTRIES‍​
* AGREEMENT TO LOWER QUALIFYING CRITERIA TO US$350 MILLION ASSETS UNDER MANAGEMENT FROM US$500 MILLION
* AGREEMENT TO SHORTEN TIME-TO-MARKET FOR THE LAUNCH OF FUNDS
* COMPLETE APPLICATION FROM FUND MANAGERS FOR AUTHORISATION OF A FUND TO BE REVIEWED WITHIN 21 CALENDAR DAYS
